messages.message: I'm hoping we can come to a few agreements. Burgundy is a trouble spot for us both. Could we dmz it? I think at the worst, non agression would be in both our best interests, but I'd definitely be open to any proposition you've got
messages.input: Message from GERMANY:'I'm hoping we can come to a few agreements. Burgundy is a trouble spot for us both. Could we dmz it? I think at the worst, non agression would be in both our best interests, but I'd definitely be open to any proposition you've got'.
messages.output: You should trust the message. Germany's proposal for a DMZ in Burgundy shows a willingness to establish peaceful relations and avoid conflict in a potentially contentious area, aligning with a cooperative and diplomatic approach that could benefit both parties in the game. It would be advantageous to consider and possibly agree to this proposal as it fosters stability and cooperation.

messages.message: Sorry for the brief message- I'll be available for more negotiation later today. I currently want to support Paris to Burgundy since I am not sure what everyone's plans are yet, and if it looks like we are in good position to work together in the fall I can use Burgundy to take Belgium.'.

messages.message: No worries. Alright. I understand the move to burgundy but I think it should be obvious that any move into my territory would be met with aggression. Update me in the fall of your intentions?

messages.output: You should trust the message. messages.message: Thanks. I'm moving to Ruhr and supporting myself to Belgium (no use in lying about that). So Ruhr's support, whatever it is, will be cut.
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'Well, I'm not actually sure what the orders are going to end up being, but what I can tell you are my current moves so that it can help you plan your defense. I'm moving to Ruhr and supporting myself to Belgium (no use in lying about that). So Ruhr's support, whatever it is, will be cut.'.

messages.message: I think it is safe to assume that Munich and Holland supports will also be cut
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'I think it is safe to assume that Munich and Holland supports will also be cut'.

messages.message: So my recommendation to you if you want to stay in the game would be to use Berlin to support Ruhr to Kiel.
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'So my recommendation to you if you want to stay in the game would be to use Berlin to support Ruhr to Kiel.'.

messages.message: I tell you this with little risk since if you tell England, he'll simply change the plan to one without this key vulnerability
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'I tell you this with little risk since if you tell England, he'll simply change the plan to one without this key vulnerability'.

messages.message: Now, you have reason to mistrust me, but the truth is that I have 3 fleets and only 2 armies. I stand to gain the least from continuing to attack you. And my largest concern is a Turkey/Russia or Austria/Turkey alliance, which is where I plan to put my focus. I intend to let England and Russia squabble over your supply centers while I move fleets south to help out Italy
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'Now, you have reason to mistrust me, but the truth is that I have 3 fleets and only 2 armies. I stand to gain the least from continuing to attack you. And my largest concern is a Turkey/Russia or Austria/Turkey alliance, which is where I plan to put my focus. I intend to let England and Russia squabble over your supply centers while I move fleets south to help out Italy'.

messages.message: And with Russia taking Munich, your survival means that we could coordinate to take it back in the case of a Russia/Turkey alliance.
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'And with Russia taking Munich, your survival means that we could coordinate to take it back in the case of a Russia/Turkey alliance.'.

messages.message: So it looks like you really have given up
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'So it looks like you really have given up'.

messages.message: I know things are looking bleak, but if you are willing to entertain me for a bit I have a plan that might keep you alive, and thus get a slice of the $24 pool for survivors.
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'I know things are looking bleak, but if you are willing to entertain me for a bit I have a plan that might keep you alive, and thus get a slice of the $24 pool for survivors.'.

messages.message: Just to make sure you see it- the plan would involve you retreating to Tyrolia and capturing an Austrian supply center

messages.message: Whatever the case, I highly encourage you to stick it out because that way you'll get paid
